name: Cloneoa
description:
The new project I barely started making gameplay for yet...     :/

Something I wanted to do at the beginning of 2019, but abandoned until now.

A project to allow users to play custom Klonoa levels, based purely on the hit GameBoy Advance game of the series: Empire of Dreams

(though I've only played up to World 1 when I played it as a kid .-.)
